SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_UMHS_ADDRESS_TRANSLATE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Builds the address for the MIMED contact address
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: UM Dev
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION dbo.USR_UFN_UMHS_ADDRESS_TRANSLATE(@ID AS UNIQUEIDENTIFIER) RETURNS NVARCHAR(300) AS BEGIN RETURN (SELECT DBO.UFN_BUILDFULLADDRESS(ADDRESS.ID, ADDRESS.ADDRESSBLOCK, ADDRESS.CITY, ADDRESS.STATEID, ADDRESS.POSTCODE, ADDRESS.COUNTRYID) FROM DBO.USR_UMHS_ADDRESS ADDRESS WHERE ADDRESS.ID = @ID); END
